rule: Lines may not begin with a category label followed by a colon.
input: Text: Facebook is creating virtual reality headsets.
coverage:

validityText:
The input provided is a string of text under the key 'text'. According to the input specification, the text may include mentions of company names. In this case, "Facebook" is the name of a company. The input also includes a description of a specific activity related to Facebook, i.e., "creating virtual reality headsets," which is a specific topic or theme. Given that the input conforms to the allowance for mentions of company names and specific topics/themes as outlined in the specification, there is no violation.

OK
